name: Luna (itch) (89o)
description:
With the coming of the new generation of mobile phones and with the Nokia 3310 dominating the market, various game developers have been hard at work constructing small video games to be played on them. Think of it as a portable console that also doubles as a phone and even audio player! The future is here!

Overview

One such developer, going by the nickname of 89o, has constructed a beautiful game of unimaginable scale. Play Luna for free now to get all these features:

  • Tricky puzzles!
  • Challenging... challenges!
  • 6 varied worlds to explore!
  • Custom animated backgrounds and hand-written titles!
  • 6 extra hidden collectibles to find!
  • And a moon to climb.
Controls

The game operates on very simple controls, as listed below:

Left/Right or A/D or 4/6 - Move left / right

Spacebar or Enter or 5 - Invert colours (also: enter a door while standing in front of it, or quit to menu when paused)

Up or W or 8 - Invert gravity

Escape or 9 - Pause/unpause game

R or 7 - Go back to the previous position when you were standing

Soundtrack

Did you fall in love with Luna's simple yet beautiful soundtrack? Do you want to support the creator and download the files to use on your MP3 player?

Not to worry! The Official Soundtrack can be found on Bandcamp:

https://89odev.bandcamp.com/album/luna-ost

Luna was made entirely by 89o in 6 days for the 3rd Nokia Jam.
